column4: let me see, the next LiveBlue-Ray will include ALL apt-get inside Ubuntu
ok please how can I SSH with a live Ubuntu Cd?
err, my bad
with Alternate CD
any LiveBlue-Ray distros yet?
eprato!grub
sorry
!grub
anyone had an experience with fixing Grub??
Whats wrong with reinstalling GRUB?
I can't boot in the first place 'cause I did the installation on a different RIBBON then I switched the ribbon and I can't boot anymore
right, you need to reinstall GRUB, not Ubuntu, just grub.  You need to point stage1 of grub (thats the stuff on the MBR) to your new HD location
how
first link there
you must have done something wrong then.  Which section on that page did you do?
is your harddrive currently at hda?
ok I have LVM2 installation how can do this with the Alternate CD? Since I've gotta mount / as well
Oh, this is LVM?  Alright.  Do you have /boot on a separate partitio?

https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows#head-ec3e41291c7a5a7b61d7827299415204067765de is instructions using alt CD.  You do need to make sure /boot is on it's own (non-LVM) partition thoug
thanks, of course is not on lvm

When the Ubuntu splash screen comes up with the boot: prompt, type in rescue and press enter. <--- I just got a kernel panic by doing this. Doesn't it mean to select the rescue option in the Splash menu?
Selecting rescue will work too, yeah (used to not have that fancy menu)
